t: Minky Accessories, Bags, Scarves & More | Minky Couture
s: Minky Couture's Annie Bags are made of a soft and plush fabric called minky fabric. Minky fabric is a type of polyester fabric that has a raised, plush texture, and it is known for being very soft and cuddly. Our minky bags are also fully lined for added strength and durability. The soft and plush feel of minky fabric is what sets our bags apart from other brands ...
